website.title: Renan Hozumi Barbieri | Arquiteto de Software

about_me.des: Developing mobile and web solutions from the start of my career, being closer to mobile environment. Whenever possible I toked management responsabilities, aways trying to implement Agile culture, mainly by it's attribute to value transparency and quality.

projects.jalpc: This project is my project. I use javescript to get repo's information all my repos have only one request.
projects.cpython: This project is other's project. I use another request to get repo's information.

career.gazeus_desc: Developing Android libs that needs multi-thread solution with high impact on company's game behavior.
career.radix_desc: Focused developer on mobile applications, specialist at Android platform. Developing apps with many active users for big companies, as VLT Rio and Ipiranga.
career.fourmix_2_desc: Working on analysis, planning and development of Android projects, Web and Cross Platform
career.gap_desc: Helping to create an extension group on mobile area for my university. I gave lessons on mini course of Android development. At same time, I manage and develop internal projects, besides create patterns of documentation.
career.ejcm_desc: At junior enterprise I worked on Marketing, Quality and Finance areas. In marketing I executed projects that assisted at the propagation of enterprise brand. At my passage on quality area I assisted on internal control and on some projects planning
